0_instruction: Locations on the Map {hotkey:map} marked with {icon:Wardrobe_New_Purchased_Item, 3.0}  contain new purchased items.
1_instruction: Purchased armor, weapon and other character cosmetics are found in the Wardrobe {icon:Marker_Wardrobe, 3.0}
2_instruction: Purchased mounts and mount cosmetics are found in the Stable {icon:Marker_Vendor_Stable, 3.0}
3_instruction: Purchased emotes are found when editing the Action Wheel {icon:Store_Icon_Wheel, 2.0}
title: Find Your Purchases
